content: @Lloyd McKenzie What's the preferred method for requesting a new git repo be created on HL7 (github.com/hl7)? A new repo is needed for 'Dental Data Exchange'.

Ideally figure out what your IG code is going to be (i.e. what the path to your IG when published should look like). Then let Grahame or I know - along with the Git ids for who should be committers. Anyone who isn't already a committer on an HL7 Git repository will need to also send me an email indicating that they agree to abide by chapter 16 of HL7's Governance and Operations Manual (GOM) and that they've signed up for and agree to actively monitor #committers/announce.
Sounds good, will do. Thanks for clarifying Lloyd.
